abbot.editor.actions
Class EditorAction

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractAction
      abbot.editor.actions.EditorAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
EditorConstants, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action
Direct Known Subclasses:
EditorToggleAction
public abstract class EditorAction
extends javax.swing.AbstractAction
implements EditorConstants

Encapsulate GUI attributes for an editor action.

See Also:
